contexts.context: Seven Daedra came to her one night and each one <mark>gave</mark> to the egg new motions that could be achieved by certain...
...Vivec in his later years found a better one and so <mark>gave</mark> this secret to his people.
...was trying to hurt her, and the look of appreciation she <mark>gave</mark> him was enough to make all his days since then worth...
In a battle with Mehrunes Dagon, Vivec <mark>gave</mark> his own silver longsword to the Daedra Lord rather than dishonor...
...asked for an enchanted ring that would help him. The ring <mark>gave</mark> its wearer great powers of persuasion; for safety, it...
